title: Amazon Kickstart V2 - Step by Step To Profits 2013
description:
Content:

Module 1

In this module we will run through EXACTLY what the course is, why it is so effective and how it works. 
To get you taking action we will also show you some proof of sales coming in and noise killer SE0 listings on Google that we have achieved with these EXACT methods! 
We will also introduce to the forum and how to get the most out of it! 

Module 2

In this module we run through how you can be sure that the product you are picking will be a winner! 
We run through how to make sure the product has a "buzz surrounding it and how to make sure the keywords you pick will have thousands of hungry buyers searching for them. 

Module 3

In this module we will guide you through how you can get an A Class site out there that will make you money fast! This module is focused on speed - nothing technical or fancy - JUST a process that works... 

Module 4

This module is where it gets interesting! For your site to get visitors and targeted ones at that it will need to get ranked!

Module 5

In this module we talk about building on a winning product and site once you have it! How to make the most out of the site that is getting sales and how you can push it further! 

Module 6

This module will introduce you to the forum and how you can set yourself targets with other members and join in on case studies! 

If you want to make money with Amazon there will be a few days when you feel that you are not doing so wellso a helping hand or a kick up the butt or even just to hear another point of view will get you motivated!
